name: Strong and Stable (natpat)
description:
Theresa May always said she was Strong and Stable… but it looks like she’s angry!!

You are Sir Lancelot, and you have been resurrected to save the British People from an angry, unstable, disembodied Theresa May! Watch out for her Euroscepticism, her dance moves, her naughty secrets, and of course, the magic money tree.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • X to Attack
  • Z or Up to Jump.

Mobile friendly!
